state_analysis: The GLPK Integer Optimizer is still processing the integer optimization problem, with the output showing updates on the progress. The command to extract the objective value has not executed successfully due to the absence of the solution file.
explanation: We must continue to allow the GLPK optimizer to complete its execution. Once it finishes and generates the 'solution.txt' file, we will run the command to extract the integer part of the objective value from that file.
